definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: Read about a recently discovered earthlike planet.
sentences.chinese: 阅读关于一颗近期发现的类地行星的文章。

sentences.english: The conclusions in this article can be used for reference in the calculation of the Love numbers for the terres-trial planets.
sentences.chinese: 本文所得结论为类地行星洛夫数的计算提供了借鉴。

sentences.english: They are known as terrestrial or earthlike planets because of their similar size and composition.
sentences.chinese: 它们的大小和成分与地球相似，因此被称为类地行星。

sentences.english: When do you think we'll see the first Earth-like planet?
sentences.chinese: 你认为我们什么时候可以看到第一课类地行星？

definition: Titan (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn VI
Enceladus (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn II
liquid water (as opposed to steam or ice)
Johannes Kepler (1571-1630), German astronomer and formulator of Kepler's laws of planetary motion
